**Tender Announcement - Snow Removal Services**
=============================================

### Invitation Number and Reference

* Invitation Number: W6898-230620
* Reference Number: WS4108609238-Doc4108618700

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: July 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 10, 2023, at 14:00:00

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to tender for snow removal services at the Woodstock Armoury, located in Woodstock, New Brunswick. The contract spans from October 1, 2023, to April 30, 2024, with two one-year option periods.

### Tender Description

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary labour, materials, tools, and equipment for snow clearance and removal at the specified site. Bidders may request a debriefing within 15 working days from notification of their unsuccessful bid submission.

### Key Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded based on lowest price.

### Tender Documents

For further details, please refer to the tender documents available online at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16932828?extsite=MTY5MzI4MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16932828?extsite=MTY5MzI4MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Participating Entities

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions, please contact Sonia Stockman at [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).  Please note that no phone number or fax number is provided.
